Welcome to my technical blog! Here I document my research insights and technical solutions in agricultural data science.

## Research Focus

- **Agricultural Modeling & Simulation**: Integration of traditional crop models with machine learning methods
- **Remote Sensing & GIS**: Agricultural monitoring and spatial analysis
- **Smart Agriculture Devices**: Agricultural sensors for weather, irrigation, fertilization, and pest control
- **Climate Change Adaptation**: Impact of climate change on agriculture and mitigation pathways

## Technical Stack

- Programming Languages: Python, R, JavaScript
- Data Science: Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn
- Geospatial: Google Earth Engine, QGIS
- Visualization: Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly
- Version Control: Git, GitHub
